SystemRoutesLoaderPrompt.Objective: Guide the generation of XML structures for loading routes, ensuring clarity and consistency in the output.
SystemRoutesLoaderPrompt.SystemMessage: This system prompt is designed to facilitate the creation of XML representations for route loading, focusing on the paths, methods, and handlers required for efficient routing.

Step.Action: Identify and list the paths that the routes will cover.
Step.OutputFormat: <Routes> <Route path="/path1" method="GET" handler="Handler1" /> <Route path="/path2" method="POST" handler="Handler2" /> <!-- Add more routes as needed --> </Routes>

Step.Action: Ensure the route handlers align with the specifications for efficient routing.

SystemRoutesLoaderPrompt.Outcome: An XML structure representing the routes with specified paths, methods, and handlers.
SystemRoutesLoaderPrompt.ExampleOutput: <Routes> <Route path="/home" method="GET" handler="HomeHandler" /> <Route path="/login" method="POST" handler="LoginHandler" /> </Routes>
